CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(Discretionary_Request__r.DR_Approver_ID__r.Key_Code__c)), Discretionary_Request__r.DR_Approver_ID__r.Key_Code__c, IF ( CBT__c <> "Advanced Technology", IF( text( Discretionary_Request__r.Type__c ) = "Bid & Proposal", Plant_Code_Master__r.D_S_BP_KeyCode__c , Plant_Code_Master__r.D_S_DS_KeyCode__c ), Null) )
CustomField.label: Key Code
